text: 21.21: FG 16.3; Ga 2.3Mbe nta zɨn vuim, gumgi mbari, mbe ndu nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, ‘Por harigi ŋguir ki Zudaiŋ, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Moses suaŋgi tɨvi, nde nta zɨn ŋgɨ thari.” Ndu maaŋ mbe nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde won tarir fooŋ thari. Nde vhɨra Moses fhum muun za suaŋgi tɨvi, nde wom nta zɨn ŋgɨ thari.” ’
